Package ohos.miscservices.download

Provides download service-related classes and interfaces.

This package allows you to configure and operate download sessions using either HTTP or HTTPS. You can perform basic download task operations such as adding or removing a task, query download information, and set download session listeners.

With this package, you can create a remote download session on another device in the HarmonyOS network so that it can download data for the local device without consuming local network and storage resources. The remote download sessions support both HTTP and HTTPS. You can also query and remove created sessions.

Since:
3
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDownloadListener
    Provides callbacks to listen for download session status.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DownloadConfig
    Defines configuration of download sessions.
    DownloadConfig.Builder
    Provides Builder objects of download configuration, including methods to set parameters used to create a download session.
    DownloadSession
    Defines an HTTP or HTTPS download session as a DownloadSession object and provides management interfaces, such as starting, pausing, resuming, and deleting a session, and querying session details.
    DownloadSession.DownloadInfo
    Provides methods for obtaining download session information and status.
